attributes.action: Reimburse Stamp Duty to first time buyers paid 01/01/10 - 24/03/10
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should reimburse stamp duty unfairly paid by first time buyers in the interim period from 1st January 2010 to 24th March 2010.
The stamp duty concession was removed on 31st December 2009 and was then re-introduced for first time buyers in the Budget.It is surely totally unfair on those first time buyers were were caught in this "black hole". Many were unable to complete by the end of 2009 through circumstances beyond their control and had to pay this unjust 1% levy.
